short_summary: Correctional Services Canada (CSC) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of five (5) Stryker Power-Pro XT Powered Cots – Model 6506 to various locations in Alberta and Saskatchewan.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-09-07 at 2:00 p.m. EDT. the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Canada Buys posting closing time. All bids submitted after 2:00 pm EDT will result in the bid being declared nonresponsive. Correctional Services Canada (CSC) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of five (5) Stryker Power-Pro XT Powered Cots – Model 6506 to various locations in Alberta and Saskatchewan.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### General Information

* **Title**: 21520-246983 Stryker Power-Pro XT Powered Cot
* **Reference Number**: WS4051371925-Doc4051507857
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4051371925
* **Publication Date**: August 10, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 7, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Amendment Date**: August 28, 2023

### Tender Details

* **Description**: Correctional Services Canada (CSC) is seeking proposals from Offerors to provide five (5) Stryker Power-Pro XT Powered Cots – Model 6506 to various locations in Alberta and Saskatchewan.
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 4, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: September 29, 2026

### Tender Process

* **Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Evaluation Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Partnerships and Interests

* **Trade Agreements**: [Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement]
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None

### Delivery Information

* **Regions of Delivery**: Grand Cache, Prince Albert, Drumheller, Saskatoon

### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* **Contact**: Funk, Rod, (rod.funk@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Documents

* **URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16557414?extsite=MTY1NTc0MTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16557414?extsite=MTY1NTc0MTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Note that I reformatted the correct data to better reflect a structured and easy-to-read format, with clear identification and definitions for budget fields
